welenda sewa aayathana 48k niyojanaya karamin kridaka kridikawan 500kata aasanna sankhyawak mewara tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.ee athara supiri kridaka niluka karunarathna samaga thilini jayasinha, dinuka karunarathna, ruwini rathnasiri, chandrika da silwa, nadisha gayanthi wethi.me tharagawaliya wiwrutha, awurudu 40n ihala pirimi, awurudu 35n ihala kantha, awurudu 50n ihala pirimi washayen tharaga pawathwena athara wiwrutha tharagawaliya yatathe kewala, mishra ha yugala tharaga kantha ha pirimi washayen da, 40n ihala jyeshta pirimi kewala ha yugala washayen da pawathwena athara 35n ihala jyeshta kantha kewala ha yugala washayen pawathwe.
